MARKUS

When using MARKUS in your work, please credit the authors and their work as follows:

Citation

Ho, Hou Ieong Brent, and Hilde De Weerdt. MARKUS. Text Analysis and Reading Platform. 2014- http://dh.chinese-empires.eu/beta/ Funded by the European Research Council and the Digging into Data Challenge.

MARKUS was developed as part of the project “Communication and Empire: Chinese Empires in Comparative Perspective,” funded by the European Research Council.
